FOR ALL OF YOU WHO ALREADY HAVE EPISODE 1 INSTALLED:

Unpack and install the episode 2 normally. It will install Episode 1 too. After that, just copy the folder "WalkingDead102" from the new installation and paste it into the "Pack" folder of your previous installation. So, you can discard the files of the new one. Hope it can help, worked for me.
